word:
I shall return to him the money invested in Australia just as soon as means come in to me from my book. Then the gifts will have come from me, 


                                -340- 

and not from him. The money was given by him to be used until he called for it. Every dollar of personal donation in my own behalf, I have invested in meetinghouses and in advancing the work in different lines. I have invested no less than $500 that have been sent to me as a personal donation to be used for myself. Not one dollar of it have I used for my own personal interest.
